title: WATCHMEN Episode 8 Breakdown! New Theories and Easter Eggs!
author: Think Story
comment: I guess Laurie's "Excalibur" was accurate size? 🤣⚔️
John Abar is also the name of the main character in the 1977 movie "Abar, The First Black Superman" who fights against white supremacists.
That episode was nearly an hour and ten minutes but felt like it was just ten minutes. I'm going to be uber depressed when I'll have to wait for season 2.
Episode 8 was one of the best televison show episode ever felt like a movie so much emotion drama plot twist what a roller coaster !!

When Angela is about to go out and confront the 7th Cavalry and defend Dr. Manhattan and he tells her "this is the moment I fell in love with you"... That was AMAZING. One of the most powerful TV moments I have seen. So fucking well done. Im so glad they got Lindelof for this. The Leftovers is one of my favorite series of all time and when I found out he would be helming and HBO series about my favorite comic of all time I knew it was gonna be phenomenal. And STILL it continues to surpass my expectations.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 8 of HBO's Watchmen "A God Walks into Abar". We'll recap, review, point out easter eggs and details you missed of the series based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
